item.title: Chakra-raxA-mantra
item.description:
Source: TW

Atleast 200 years old weapon of #Khalsa army. A chakkar/quoit. Engraved in gold are verses by fifth #Sikh Guru Shri Arjan Dev that serve as a #RakshaMantra (protective spell). Each line of mantra makes multiple invocations to the #Hindu god #Vishnu. Language of mantra is Sahaskriti —a modified version of Sanskrit first used by founder of Sikhi —Guru Nanak Dev Ji.
